name: Ian M. FERGUSON, a Minor by His Parents and Natural Guardians, Elizabeth J. Ferguson and Michael Ferguson and Elizabeth Ferguson and Michael Ferguson, In Their Own Right, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund and Pennsylvania Property and Casualty Insurance Guaranty Association, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Ferguson ex rel. Ferguson v. Commonwealth

parties: Ian M. FERGUSON, a Minor by His Parents and Natural Guardians, Elizabeth J. Ferguson and Michael Ferguson and Elizabeth Ferguson and Michael Ferguson, In Their Own Right, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund and Pennsylvania Property and Casualty Insurance Guaranty Association, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2003, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice LAMB did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Ian M. FERGUSON, a Minor by His Parents and Natural Guardians, Elizabeth J. Ferguson and Michael Ferguson and Elizabeth Ferguson and Michael Ferguson, In Their Own Right, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund and Pennsylvania Property and Casualty Insurance Guaranty Association, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 18, 2003.
